change_password_about: Don’t worry! It’s happens. Please enter your old and new password.

how_can_subscribe: How can I subscribe to the channel?
can_subscribe: You can subscribe to the Homz channel by clicking the subscribe button on the homepage.
how_can_follow_the_channel: How can I follow the channel?
you_can_follow: You can follow the Homz channel on various social media platforms by visiting our homepage.
how_do_delete_my_account: How do I delete my account?
to_delete_account: To delete your account, go to Settings, and select the "Delete Account" option.
how_do_exit_the_app: How do I exit the app?
tod_exit_the_app: To exit the app, simply click the back button or use your device\'s home button to close the app.

name: Name
enter_phone_to_reset: Enter your Mobile number to reset your password.
your_password_must_strong: Your new password must be strong.
we_have_sent_code: We have sent a verification code to your email.
if_dont_have_code: If you didn’t receive the code?
password_must_be_6: Password must not be less than 6 characters!
password_must_contain_consist: The password must consist of a combination of uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and special symbols.
